actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To require the reissuance of a certificate of documentation for a vessel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to reissue a certificate of documentation with a fishery endorsement to the vessel with the United States official number 666937.

titles.title: To require the reissuance of a certificate of documentation for a vessel, and for other purposes.
